content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a person named Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: I did not agree on a final price because the landlord, Peter Schmidt, was seeking a higher price than I was willing to pay. I felt that the offered price of 720 Euro per month was fair for the location and size of the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Why did you rate the negotiation partner as a 10?
name: Evaluator

content: I rated the negotiation partner as a 10 because the interaction was respectful and polite. The landlord, Mr. Schmidt, was clear and straightforward in his communication, which made the negotiation process smooth and efficient.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
